MESSAGE.Translation: He had stretched his arm out for Rin, but grabbed nothing except for air.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室内を見回してもその姿はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around in the classroom but couldn't see Rin anywhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around in the classroom but couldn't see Rin anywhere.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「鈴の奴、逃げやがったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That Rin... did she run away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That Rin... did she run away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「探してくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll go look for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll go look for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、どうせ猫と遊んでんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah, she's obviously playing with her cats somewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah, she's obviously playing with her cats somewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、先に行ってるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, I'm leaving first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, I'm leaving first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「案外、先に行ってるのかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's possible she might have gone there ahead of us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's possible she might have gone there ahead of us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうだな…じゃ、オレたちもいくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Maybe you're right... Then, we should get going too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Maybe you're right... Then, we should get going too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が大きな背中を揺すり、教室を出ていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato left the classroom shaking his giant back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato left the classroom shaking his giant back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（手ぶらで帰るんだなー…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Is he just gonna leave his textbooks in class like that...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Is he just gonna leave his textbooks in class like that...)

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことを考えていると、反対側のドアが勢いよく開く音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: While I was pondering this, the door on the opposite side opened with a loud sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I was pondering this, the door on the opposite side opened with a loud sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん？　あれ、三枝さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh? Oh, Saigusa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh? Oh, Saigusa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 入ってきたのは三枝さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The person who entered the room was Saigusa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The person who entered the room was Saigusa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: ずかずか、とクラスメイトがもう二、三人しかいない教室を歩いてきて。
MESSAGE.EN: Making a lot of noise, she made her way toward me through the classroom, which only had us and two more classmates left inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Making a lot of noise, she made her way toward me through the classroom, which only had us and two more classmates left inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…んっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Ah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Ah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずい、と僕に向かって何かを差し出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed something to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed something to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「朝貸した辞典？　もういいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it's that dictionary you borrowed this morning. Don't need it anymore?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it's that dictionary you borrowed this morning. Don't need it anymore?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「んっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Mmh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Mmh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく見たら三枝さんは辞典を人差し指と親指だけで摘んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon closer inspection, she appeared to be holding it with just her index finger and thumb.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon closer inspection, she appeared to be holding it with just her index finger and thumb.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は辞典を受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the dictionary from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the dictionary from her.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「理樹くん、言いたいことがあるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, there's something I have to tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, there's something I have to tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「理樹くんの机見せて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Let me take a look at your desk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Let me take a look at your desk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、え、え、なに、なに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝E-eh, eh... wh-what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝E-eh, eh... wh-what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんはいきなり僕を押しのけると、机の中を覗き込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden she pushed me aside and peered into my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden she pushed me aside and peered into my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: それから三枝さんは、ぴん、と一本指を立てて言った。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, she exclaimed while pointing with her finger:
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, she exclaimed while pointing with her finger:

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「整理整頓！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝You have to keep things tidy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝You have to keep things tidy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いきなり、何？　脈絡ないよ三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's this, out of the blue? You're not making any sense, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's this, out of the blue? You're not making any sense, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 説明してよ、と僕は促した。
MESSAGE.EN: I was urging her for an explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was urging her for an explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「う～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Mmm～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Mmm～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんは唸った。
MESSAGE.EN: She groaned.
MESSAGE.Translation: She groaned.

MESSAGE.JP: 唸りながら、頭の二本尻尾の長いほうを指で弄っている。
MESSAGE.EN: While doing so, she twirled the longer of her pigtails with a finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: While doing so, she twirled the longer of her pigtails with a finger.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「理樹くん、ばっちぃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, you're so sloppy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, you're so sloppy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「人を指差すものじゃありませんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't point at people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't point at people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「だって、これを見てよ、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But come on, look at this here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But come on, look at this here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 辞典をあごで示しながら三枝さんが言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, nodding toward the dictionary.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, nodding toward the dictionary.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、見ようとしても出せないんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't. It's completely covered with duct tape.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't. It's completely covered with duct tape.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「いいから、見てっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Whatever, just look!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Whatever, just look!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 指一本ぐらいの背表紙の辞典はテープぐるぐる巻きではなくなっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The cover of the dictionary was partly unwrapped, but not by much, just about a finger's length.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cover of the dictionary was partly unwrapped, but not by much, just about a finger's length.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？　袋から出したんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You unwrapped it and took it out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You unwrapped it and took it out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「うわ、やっぱり知ってたんだ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Uwa, so you did know after all, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Uwa, so you did know after all, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「知ってるって何を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did know what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did know what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉の続きで僕はちょっと開くのをためらった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her choice of words made me hesitant to go any further.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her choice of words made me hesitant to go any further.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なぜか開けてはいけない気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...For some reason, I feel like I shouldn't unwrap it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...For some reason, I feel like I shouldn't unwrap it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「開けないとダメです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝You can't not open it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝You can't not open it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんは真顔で言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said with a serious look on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said with a serious look on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもなんかこう、オーラが出てるよオーラが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you know... with this kind of atmosphere hanging around it, something is bound to happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you know... with this kind of atmosphere hanging around it, something is bound to happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 開けてはならないオーラ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was emitting a ❛don't open, no matter what❜ kind of aura.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was emitting a ❛don't open, no matter what❜ kind of aura.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜか禍々しい匂いがする。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason, I could sense a very sinister odor coming from it.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason, I could sense a very sinister odor coming from it.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「大丈夫。私も開けたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Don't worry, I opened it once already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Don't worry, I opened it once already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、でもなんで僕が開けなくちゃいけないのかな…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... why are you insisting on making me open it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... why are you insisting on making me open it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「理樹くんの辞典だからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Because it's your dictionary!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Because it's your dictionary!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら開けなくてはいけないらしい…
MESSAGE.EN: Anyhow, it seems like I have no other choice but to open it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyhow, it seems like I have no other choice but to open it...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「嫌だよ、なんか嫌」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to... I just don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to... I just don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「開けないとダメ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝You must.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝You must.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしてさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And why is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And why is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「りきくんのじてんだからです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It's your dictionary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It's your dictionary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな無表情で言われてもっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if she says that with such an expressionless face...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if she says that with such an expressionless face...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…しょ、しょうがないなぁ、え、い、っと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-it can't be helped then... okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-it can't be helped then... okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 若干気合を入れなければならなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't really do it without firing myself up a bit.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't really do it without firing myself up a bit.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして開けた途端僕は絶句した。
MESSAGE.EN: I began opening it and... was struck speechless.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began opening it and... was struck speechless.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱたん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clap*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clap*.

MESSAGE.JP: また閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed it again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed it again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんかスゴイものが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...This is pretty incredible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...This is pretty incredible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 赤いのとか白いのとか黄色いのとか。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something red, white, and yellow.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something red, white, and yellow.

MESSAGE.JP: そういうのがでろでろしてた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was oozing out from it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was oozing out from it.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「すごかったでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Amazing, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Amazing, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「視覚的にも嗅覚的にもすごいね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was unbelievable... How it looked and how it smelled, as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was unbelievable... How it looked and how it smelled, as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「それを授業中に広げた私の立場になってみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Just imagine how it was when I opened it during class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Just imagine how it was when I opened it during class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、あ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「周りから浴びせられる冷たい視線・しせん・シセン！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Everyone around me shot me such cold glares... from everywhere, everywhere, everywhere!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Everyone around me shot me such cold glares... from everywhere, everywhere, everywhere!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「まるでこの世とも思われないほどの、言うならば腐敗・ザ・腐敗」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝And what I uncovered was something unearthly, if I were to put it into words: ❛Decay of the Decay.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝And what I uncovered was something unearthly, if I were to put it into words: ❛Decay of the Decay.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんか強そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Sounds sorta serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Sounds sorta serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はとりあえずボケてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to joke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to joke.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…意識が負けちゃったよ、私！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...I was on the verge of fainting!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...I was on the verge of fainting!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「そしてぐずぐずになったページがばら撒かれるのを想像してみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Just try to imagine the wet pages falling onto the floor and getting scattered around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Just try to imagine the wet pages falling onto the floor and getting scattered around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うあー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 想像したくない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to imagine it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to imagine it...

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「机の中にジャムとかヨーグルトとかプリンとか隠してたでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Things like jam, pudding or yogurt... you have it all in your desk, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Things like jam, pudding or yogurt... you have it all in your desk, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「机の中に入れていいのはプリントだけ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The only thing you should put in there is your printouts!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The only thing you should put in there is your printouts!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴんと、指を一本立てながら三枝さんは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She asserted, extending a finger for emphasis.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asserted, extending a finger for emphasis.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや、僕のせいじゃないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But, it's really not my fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But, it's really not my fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ちゃんと隣の友達の机の中に入れておくっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So make sure to put things like that in your friends' desks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So make sure to put things like that in your friends' desks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…え？　どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh? Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh? Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「だって親しくないクラスメイトの机の中に手を突っ込んでたら危ないひとでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, if you just put your hand in the desk of someone you aren't very close with, they'll think you're a dangerous person, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, if you just put your hand in the desk of someone you aren't very close with, they'll think you're a dangerous person, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「友達の机なら大丈夫。爽やかに笑いながらですな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But if it's your friend's desk, it's fine, they'll just laugh it off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But if it's your friend's desk, it's fine, they'll just laugh it off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「『もうしょうがないなぁ、あいつは忘れ物ばっかりして』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝❛Geez, what a helpless guy he is, always forgetting stuff here and there.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝❛Geez, what a helpless guy he is, always forgetting stuff here and there.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「『オレがいないとしょうがないなぁ』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝❛If it weren't for me, what would he do.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝❛If it weren't for me, what would he do.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「『よし忘れ物が見つかった、持っていってやろうやろう』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝❛All right, he must've left this behind again, I should give it back to him.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝❛All right, he must've left this behind again, I should give it back to him.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…という風になるわけですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...And that's how it'll go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...And that's how it'll go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ならないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No it won't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No it won't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「というか、ちゃんと冷蔵庫に入れようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean, keep your food in the fridge properly!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean, keep your food in the fridge properly!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「お腹すいたときに困るじゃないデスカ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But what if you get hungry? It'll be troublesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But what if you get hungry? It'll be troublesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「食堂で食べなさいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please, eat in the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please, eat in the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たぶん真人の机の中には食料がたくさん詰まっていたに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure she's stuffed a lot of food in Masato's desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure she's stuffed a lot of food in Masato's desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 恐らく食べかけが。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps... half-eaten things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps... half-eaten things.

MESSAGE.JP: そして辞典にこぼれてしまったまま、放置された。
MESSAGE.EN: Then my dictionary got covered with them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then my dictionary got covered with them.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「身近で常に危機は迫っているのだよ、理樹くんなななんだってー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Don't forget, danger is always close at hand. Wh-wh-wh-what the heck, Riki-kun!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Don't forget, danger is always close at hand. Wh-wh-wh-what the heck, Riki-kun!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それ誰の物まねですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who's that supposed to be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who's that supposed to be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ついでに言うと小学校とかプリンのあまりモノは争奪戦だったよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝On another note, there was always such a scramble for leftover pudding back in the elementary school years.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝On another note, there was always such a scramble for leftover pudding back in the elementary school years.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「確保したプリンは机の中にひっそりと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝And the secured pudding would be quietly slipped into your desk in secrecy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝And the secured pudding would be quietly slipped into your desk in secrecy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そこでどうして僕の机の中を覗き込むんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So how does that relate to your peeking inside my desk!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So how does that relate to your peeking inside my desk!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「プリン、欲しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I want some pudding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I want some pudding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「食堂行ってきなさいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Go get it from the cafeteria!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Go get it from the cafeteria!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ちぇー。ちぇー。ちぇー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Tsk, tsk, tsk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Tsk, tsk, tsk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんでそんなに不満そうかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why the dissatisfied look?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why the dissatisfied look?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「じゃ、食べに行ってくるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Fine, I'll go have some then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Fine, I'll go have some then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「理樹くん、辞典返したよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, I did give back your dictionary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, I did give back your dictionary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのまま捨ててもらっても構わないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wouldn't have minded even if you'd thrown it away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wouldn't have minded even if you'd thrown it away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「匂いかいで楽しめるから大ジョブ大ジョブ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It's fine, since you can enjoy the smell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It's fine, since you can enjoy the smell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「なんたって腐りかけがなんでも一番美味しいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It's always the rotting part that's the most delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It's always the rotting part that's the most delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ファイバーだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝And it's fiber too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝And it's fiber too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ファイバーにもホドがあるよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's way too much fiber!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's way too much fiber!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「じゃ、またね理樹くん～。あ、プリン入れておいてあげようか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, I'll catch you later, Riki-kun. Oh, should I leave you a pudding?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, I'll catch you later, Riki-kun. Oh, should I leave you a pudding?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「要りませんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No thanks!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No thanks!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あはは～。ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ahaha～. Bye bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ahaha～. Bye bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひらひらと手を振って三枝さんは教室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san left the classroom with a slight wave of her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san left the classroom with a slight wave of her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…しかし、どうしよう、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What am I gonna do with this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What am I gonna do with this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮のゴミ箱にでも入れておくか。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll just toss it into the garbage bin at the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll just toss it into the garbage bin at the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はため息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I sighed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sighed.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の予想通り、鈴はまたみごとに猫と遊んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as Masato had guessed, Rin was playing with cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as Masato had guessed, Rin was playing with cats.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃう～。
MESSAGE.EN: Meooow～.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meooow～.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「順番だから待ってろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll brush you in order, just wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll brush you in order, just wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 無防備に腰を地面に落とした鈴の周りには猫たちが取り囲んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Various cats crowded around Rin, who was innocently relaxing her lower body on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Various cats crowded around Rin, who was innocently relaxing her lower body on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか行儀良くしている猫が多いみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There seemed to somehow be quite a large number of well-mannered cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: There seemed to somehow be quite a large number of well-mannered cats.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「順番ー、じゅんばんー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Order, oorderr～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Order, oorderr～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「めっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Bad!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Bad!❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Meoww.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meoww.

MESSAGE.JP: そろそろと鈴に近寄ろうとした黒猫は、鈴に叱られて固まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: A black cat that had tried to approach Rin was stopped dead in its tracks by her scolding.
MESSAGE.Translation: A black cat that had tried to approach Rin was stopped dead in its tracks by her scolding.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえは後回しだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's not your turn yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's not your turn yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ものぐさなのが先」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The lazy ones go first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The lazy ones go first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「一番ものぐさなのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The laziest one is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The laziest one is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いっぱいいるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There's so many of you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There's so many of you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「というかおまえ、さっきまで毛並み乱れてなかったろ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait, your fur wasn't so disheveled until just a while ago!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait, your fur wasn't so disheveled until just a while ago!❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなの知りませんって顔で鳴くなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't try to meow at me with that ❛I have no idea❜ expression!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't try to meow at me with that ❛I have no idea❜ expression!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まぁいい…おまえもやってやるから待ってろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh well... I'll do yours too, so wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh well... I'll do yours too, so wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごそごそ、と取りだしたのは、ブラシだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The rustling sound of a hairbrush resounded.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rustling sound of a hairbrush resounded.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫たちはグルーミングの順番待ちをしているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like the cats were lining up to get their fur groomed.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like the cats were lining up to get their fur groomed.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Come here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Come here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ！
MESSAGE.EN: Myow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow!

MESSAGE.JP: グレイのしましま猫が寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: A gray-striped cat approached Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: A gray-striped cat approached Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「はい、ごろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, roll over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, roll over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ！
MESSAGE.EN: Myow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow!

MESSAGE.JP: 足を出すしま猫。
MESSAGE.EN: The striped cat reached out its paw.
MESSAGE.Translation: The striped cat reached out its paw.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「違う！　誰もお手をしろとはいってない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Not that! Nobody's telling you to give a paw.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Not that! Nobody's telling you to give a paw.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Myow...
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しょんぼりするな。お手ができるおまえはえらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't look so down. You're great for being able to give your paw.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't look so down. You're great for being able to give your paw.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ！
MESSAGE.EN: Myow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃ、ごろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well then, roll over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well then, roll over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃー！
MESSAGE.EN: Myow～!
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow～!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「違う！　尻尾を立てるな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No! Don't raise your tail!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No! Don't raise your tail!❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Myow...
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しょんぼりするなとゆーに。尻尾もやってやるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Aww, don't look so depressed. I'll groom your tail too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Aww, don't look so depressed. I'll groom your tail too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ！
MESSAGE.EN: Myow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ほら、ごろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Alright, roll over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Alright, roll over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ。ごろんごろんごろん。
MESSAGE.EN: Myow! *Rolly*rolly*roll*.
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow! *Rolly*rolly*roll*.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「待て！　どこいくつもりだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait, where are you going!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait, where are you going!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごろごろごろ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Rolly*rolly*roll*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Rolly*rolly*roll*.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「戻ってきたな…からかってんのかおまえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, you're back... Are you teasing me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, you're back... Are you teasing me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: Myow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Myow!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まぁ、いい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は寝転がったしま猫の腹をブラシで梳き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin started brushing the belly of the cat lying on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin started brushing the belly of the cat lying on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 傍目から見ても丁寧な手の動きだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even an outsider could tell how delicate her movements were.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even an outsider could tell how delicate her movements were.

MESSAGE.JP: みゃーぅーぉー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meeoww...
MESSAGE.Translation: Meeoww...

MESSAGE.JP: 間延びした猫の鳴き声が鈴の手業のほどを語っている。
MESSAGE.EN: His slow and lazy purring was proof of the quality of her handling skills.
MESSAGE.Translation: His slow and lazy purring was proof of the quality of her handling skills.

MESSAGE.JP: 気持ちよさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He seemed to be having a good time.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seemed to be having a good time.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「くねくねするな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Stop wriggling your body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Stop wriggling your body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…うねうねもするな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Don't coil up, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Don't coil up, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ふにゃふにゃするなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Stop going limp as well!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Stop going limp as well!❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃー？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow～?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow～?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだったな。猫はふにゃふにゃするイキモノだった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's right... cats are laid-back animals...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's right... cats are laid-back animals...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふにゃふにゃしていいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, being limp is fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, being limp is fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…前から思ってたけど、へそはどこにあるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...By the way, where's your navel?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...By the way, where's your navel?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「このあたりか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝About here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝About here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…んんー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 空いている指で腹をつつく鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin poked his belly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin poked his belly.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ふにふにふにふに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Soft, soft, soft...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Soft, soft, soft...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃにゃーう。
MESSAGE.EN: Me, meowww.
MESSAGE.Translation: Me, meowww.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「情けない声をだすな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't meow so pathetically.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't meow so pathetically.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「男の子だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're a boy, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're a boy, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もっとかっこよく鳴け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Cry more masculinely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Cry more masculinely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃうー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meoww.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meoww.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「全然変わってないだろそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's no different...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's no different...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 細い鈴の指が猫の喉をくすぐっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's slender fingers tickled the nape of his neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's slender fingers tickled the nape of his neck.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことをしているから猫としてはかっこよくなんか鳴けないに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: That must be the reason why he couldn't make a manly cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must be the reason why he couldn't make a manly cry.

MESSAGE.JP: しま猫は鈴の指にめろめろだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That striped cat seemed to be totally relaxed by the magic of Rin's fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: That striped cat seemed to be totally relaxed by the magic of Rin's fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「結構抜けるなー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A lot of fur came out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A lot of fur came out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふさふさのふわふわがごっそりだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All airy and fluffy now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All airy and fluffy now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブラシに絡まった白い毛の塊を取りながら鈴は満足そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked satisfied with the good results of her brushing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked satisfied with the good results of her brushing.

MESSAGE.JP: みゃーみゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow.

MESSAGE.JP: 一匹の猫が鈴のふとももに足をかけている。
MESSAGE.EN: Another cat put his paws on Rin's thigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Another cat put his paws on Rin's thigh.

MESSAGE.JP: しま猫のグルーミングに夢中な鈴はそんな猫に注意を払っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: But she, concentrating on grooming the striped cat, didn't notice it at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she, concentrating on grooming the striped cat, didn't notice it at all.

MESSAGE.JP: みゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meoww.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meoww.

MESSAGE.JP: ずるる…ぽて。
MESSAGE.EN: He tried to climb onto her lap... but failed.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tried to climb onto her lap... but failed.

MESSAGE.JP: みゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meoww.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meoww.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度も果敢に鈴のふとももを目指す茶白猫。
MESSAGE.EN: The white-brown cat kept resolutely targeting Rin's thigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: The white-brown cat kept resolutely targeting Rin's thigh.

MESSAGE.JP: ずるる…ぽて。
MESSAGE.EN: But he was unable to get up on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But he was unable to get up on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 空しくスカートの裾を爪が滑っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: His claws vainly slid down her skirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: His claws vainly slid down her skirt.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「順番だぞ、待ってろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait till your turn comes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait till your turn comes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ぐるーみーぐるーみー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Grooming, grooming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Grooming, grooming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は上機嫌だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked delighted.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked delighted.

MESSAGE.JP: しかし僕はひやひやしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I, on the other hand, was getting worried about something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I, on the other hand, was getting worried about something.

MESSAGE.JP: みゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meoww.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meoww.

MESSAGE.JP: ずるる…ぽて。
MESSAGE.EN: He was still trying.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was still trying.

MESSAGE.JP: 大変チャレンジ精神溢れる茶白猫だが…心なしか鈴のスカートがまくれあがりつつあるような…。
MESSAGE.EN: He sure is a highly motivated climber, but... her skirt seems to be slightly lifted up...
MESSAGE.Translation: He sure is a highly motivated climber, but... her skirt seems to be slightly lifted up...

MESSAGE.JP: みゃっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow!

MESSAGE.JP: ぴょん、と前足をかけ…あ、今度は本当にまずい！
MESSAGE.EN: He placed a paw on her lap again... Oh no, this is really bad!
MESSAGE.Translation: He placed a paw on her lap again... Oh no, this is really bad!

MESSAGE.JP: 角度を変えたら中庭を通りかかった誰かに見えてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: From another angle, someone might be able to see it!
MESSAGE.Translation: From another angle, someone might be able to see it!

MESSAGE.JP: というか、黙ってないで教えてあげよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I'd better tell her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I'd better tell her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は呼びかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I called out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わ、理樹だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uwa, it's Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uwa, it's Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あっちいけ、解散だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Get away, disperse!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Get away, disperse!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わらわらと体を登ってくる猫たちをはぎ取っては、投げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Since the cats were climbing all over her, she started grabbing them and throwing them off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since the cats were climbing all over her, she started grabbing them and throwing them off.

MESSAGE.JP: まるでこれまでの可愛がりかたをなかったことにするかのように。
MESSAGE.EN: She was acting as though she hadn't been treating those cats kindly a moment ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was acting as though she hadn't been treating those cats kindly a moment ago.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、見てないで、手伝えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, don't just stand there, give me a hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, don't just stand there, give me a hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何匹かをはぎ取り、腕に抱える。
MESSAGE.EN: I stripped who knows how many cats off of Rin, and held them in my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stripped who knows how many cats off of Rin, and held them in my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: そいつらは大人しく僕の腕の中で四肢を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: They hung docilely from my arms, stretching their limbs.
MESSAGE.Translation: They hung docilely from my arms, stretching their limbs.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴が優しいからみんなくっつきたがるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They all cling to you so much because you're so kind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They all cling to you so much because you're so kind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなこと…ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's... not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's... not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら、なにやら紙切れを取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason, she took out a scrap of paper while speaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason, she took out a scrap of paper while speaking.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふーむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それに目を落とし、珍しく考え事でもしているかのような鼻息を漏らした。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast her eyes down, making a serious expression, and snorted, seeming unusually deep in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast her eyes down, making a serious expression, and snorted, seeming unusually deep in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「これは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「見えないだろっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Think I can see like this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Think I can see like this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その飛ばされた猫を受け止めて、地面に下ろした後訊いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: After catching the falling cat and placing it on the ground, I asked her.
MESSAGE.Translation: After catching the falling cat and placing it on the ground, I asked her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？　ラブレター？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's this? A love letter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's this? A love letter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃないみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Seems not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Seems not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言って、僕にその紙切れを渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered and handed me the paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered and handed me the paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 折り目がたくさんある。ぐるぐる巻きにして枝にでもくくりつけてあったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It had a lot of creases, so I suspected it might have been wrapped around a branch or something.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had a lot of creases, so I suspected it might have been wrapped around a branch or something.

MESSAGE.JP: しわを伸ばしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I smoothed out the wrinkles.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smoothed out the wrinkles.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには…
MESSAGE.EN: And began reading it...
MESSAGE.Translation: And began reading it...

MESSAGE.JP: 『校門のイモムシ問題を解決せよ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Solve the school gate's caterpillar problem.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Solve the school gate's caterpillar problem.]

MESSAGE.JP: とあった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...is what it said.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...is what it said.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ラブレターじゃないだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I guess it's not a love letter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I guess it's not a love letter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guess not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guess not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はお日様に透かせたりして、それ以外のメッセージを探した。
MESSAGE.EN: I held the letter up toward the sun, trying to discover any other hidden messages.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held the letter up toward the sun, trying to discover any other hidden messages.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ちなみに、昨日も届いてるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝By the way, I got another one yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝By the way, I got another one yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ!?　同じ内容で？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh!? With the same contents?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh!? With the same contents?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにっ、これはラブレターなのかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What, is this a love letter!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What, is this a love letter!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、知らないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't know myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't know myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「見せてもらっていい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is it okay if I take a look?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is it okay if I take a look?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「これはラブレターなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is this a love letter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is this a love letter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 訊きながら、僕にその紙切れを渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: She passed me the scrap of paper as she asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: She passed me the scrap of paper as she asked.

MESSAGE.JP: 折り目がたくさんある。ぐるぐる巻きにして枝にでもくくりつけてあったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It had a lot of creases, so I suspected it might have been wrapped around a branch or something.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had a lot of creases, so I suspected it might have been wrapped around a branch or something.

MESSAGE.JP: しわを伸ばしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I smoothed out the wrinkles.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smoothed out the wrinkles.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには…
MESSAGE.EN: And began reading it...
MESSAGE.Translation: And began reading it...

MESSAGE.JP: 『校門のイモムシ問題を解決せよ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Solve the school gate's caterpillar problem.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Solve the school gate's caterpillar problem.]

MESSAGE.JP: …とあった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...is what it said.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...is what it said.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「少なくともラブレターではないみたいだけど……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even though it's not saying much, at the very least it doesn't look like a love letter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even though it's not saying much, at the very least it doesn't look like a love letter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What is it, then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What is it, then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴には心当たりないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't have any ideas?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't have any ideas?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あるんだっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You do!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You do!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、今思い出した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah, I just remembered.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah, I just remembered.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ポケットを探る。
MESSAGE.EN: She started rummaging in her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started rummaging in her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: そこから出してきたのは、また同じようなしわくちゃの紙片だ。
MESSAGE.EN: And what she brought out was another identical-looking scrap of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: And what she brought out was another identical-looking scrap of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: それを受け取り、広げてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took and unfolded it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took and unfolded it.

MESSAGE.JP: 『この世界には秘密がある』
MESSAGE.EN: [There's a secret in this world.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [There's a secret in this world.]

MESSAGE.JP: 『それを知りたいなら、すべての課題をクリアせよ』
MESSAGE.EN: [If you wish to know it, you'll have to complete every task.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [If you wish to know it, you'll have to complete every task.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふーーむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は僕が唸る番だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was my turn to groan.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was my turn to groan.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この紙はどうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where'd you get this from?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where'd you get this from?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まず第一の疑問がそれだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the foremost question.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the foremost question.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「レノンのしっぽに巻きつけられてた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It was tied to Lennon's tail.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It was tied to Lennon's tail.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こっちのは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about this one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about this one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そっちもレノンのしっぽに巻きつけられてた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That one was tied to Lennon's tail too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That one was tied to Lennon's tail too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ということは、誰かがレノンを使って、メッセージを鈴に届けさせたわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Meaning that someone used Lennon to relay this message to you, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Meaning that someone used Lennon to relay this message to you, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なるほど。そうなるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh I see, that's how it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh I see, that's how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はこくんと顎を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin cast her eyes down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin cast her eyes down.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「誰がそんなことをしてるんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I wonder who could be doing this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I wonder who could be doing this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さあ。調べてみないことにはわからないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows. I can't tell without looking into it more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows. I can't tell without looking into it more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹にはできないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Can't you do it, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Can't you do it, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、犯人を知りたいのなら、レノンの後をこっそりつけるとか方法はあるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if you want to discover the perpetrator, it's possible to secretly follow Lennon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if you want to discover the perpetrator, it's possible to secretly follow Lennon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「でもそれはなんか卑怯だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But that's kinda underhanded.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But that's kinda underhanded.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひきょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Underhanded?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Underhanded?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、まさか、真っ正直にこの課題に挑戦するの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Err... could it be that you're seriously planning on completing these tasks?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Err... could it be that you're seriously planning on completing these tasks?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうなのか？　猫からじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that so? So it wasn't some cat's doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that so? So it wasn't some cat's doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よく考えなよ、猫が文字を書けるわけないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you think about it, there's no way a cat could write anything, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you think about it, there's no way a cat could write anything, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ、誰なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, who did it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, who did it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さあ。調べてみないことにはわからないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows. I can't tell without looking into it more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows. I can't tell without looking into it more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹にはできないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Can't you do it, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Can't you do it, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、犯人を知りたいのなら、レノンの後をこっそりつけるとか方法はあるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if you want to discover the perpetrator, it's possible to secretly follow Lennon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if you want to discover the perpetrator, it's possible to secretly follow Lennon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうして欲しいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Want to try it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Want to try it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぷるぷると首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、まさか、真っ正直にこの課題に挑戦するの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Err... could it be that you're seriously planning on completing these tasks?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Err... could it be that you're seriously planning on completing these tasks?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はまた唸る。
MESSAGE.EN: I groaned inwardly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I groaned inwardly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「世界の秘密なんて子供じゃないんだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The secret of the world... You aren't a kid anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The secret of the world... You aren't a kid anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰かの悪戯だと思うんだけど…それでもやるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I bet it's just someone's prank... Even so, you still want to do it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I bet it's just someone's prank... Even so, you still want to do it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「確かめる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I want to confirm something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I want to confirm something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「犯人を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The perpetrator's identity?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The perpetrator's identity?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その人が伝えたいこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What that person is trying to tell us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What that person is trying to tell us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、そこまで言うなら止めないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh well, if you're so insistent, I'm not going to stop you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh well, if you're so insistent, I'm not going to stop you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相手の正体はまったくわからないのだ。もしかしたら質の悪い嫌がらせとも限らない。このまま鈴を放っておくのは心配だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what their real intentions were. It wasn't necessarily just a harmless joke; I was worried about leaving Rin alone to handle it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what their real intentions were. It wasn't necessarily just a harmless joke; I was worried about leaving Rin alone to handle it.

MESSAGE.JP: あることを思いつき、携帯を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: After giving it some thought, I took out my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: After giving it some thought, I took out my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴も携帯あるでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You have one as well, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You have one as well, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何かするときは状況をメールで教えてくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you text me your situation every time you're about to do something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you text me your situation every time you're about to do something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうすれば、いざという時に駆けつけることができるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you do, I'll be able to come and help you if things turn serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you do, I'll be able to come and help you if things turn serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴なら多分、僕らが驚くようなことにも平然と頭を突っ込んでいきそうだから。
MESSAGE.EN: If I left her alone, she'd definitely get involved in something unreasonable without a second thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I left her alone, she'd definitely get involved in something unreasonable without a second thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちりん、とひとつ鈴がさえずった。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell on her head chimed once.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell on her head chimed once.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえずさ、部室いこ。みんなが待ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's head to the clubroom for now. Everyone's waiting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's head to the clubroom for now. Everyone's waiting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は遅れて、部室に現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was late when she appeared in the clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was late when she appeared in the clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、揃ったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, everyone's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, everyone's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 勧誘する生徒は下校してしまっているため、放課後は練習に。
MESSAGE.EN: All the students we could potentially hope to get on our team had already gone home, so after school hours we could only practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the students we could potentially hope to get on our team had already gone home, so after school hours we could only practice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいか、おまえら逃げるなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Listen, don't you dare run away on me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Listen, don't you dare run away on me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこっ、一歩も動くんじゃねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You there, don't even take a single step.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You there, don't even take a single step.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「練習できねぇだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How are we supposed to practice then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How are we supposed to practice then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、まず今日はみんなに先に話がある。それを聞いてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, before that, I have something to discuss with you. Listen up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, before that, I have something to discuss with you. Listen up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これからの練習方針についてなんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It concerns the practice we're about to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It concerns the practice we're about to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹をバッターとして徹底的に鍛え上げる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to train really hard, and make Riki into an awesome batter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to train really hard, and make Riki into an awesome batter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「また、どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「この中で一番ひ弱そうだからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He's the weakest one among us. That's why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He's the weakest one among us. That's why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんな奴がシュアなバッティングでヒットを連ねてみろ、意外性があって、展開的に燃えるだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Could you imagine somebody like him being a big hitter? That unexpected development would make everyone go crazy with excitement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Could you imagine somebody like him being a big hitter? That unexpected development would make everyone go crazy with excitement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、また漫画の影響か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's this? A story from some manga again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's this? A story from some manga again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、鈴がピッチャーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Furthermore, Rin will be the pitcher.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Furthermore, Rin will be the pitcher.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「一応理由を聞いておくが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I wouldn't mind hearing the reason for this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I wouldn't mind hearing the reason for this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「無論、そのほうが展開的に燃えるからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Obviously, this way she'll be able to show her true colors when the time comes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Obviously, this way she'll be able to show her true colors when the time comes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「展開ってなんの展開？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝True colors... just what kind of true colors?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝True colors... just what kind of true colors?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「漫画の影響だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just like in a manga...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just like in a manga...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ばかだな、こいつは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What a fool...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What a fool...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、練習を始めるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let the training commence!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let the training commence!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹がバッター、鈴はピッチャー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you bat. Rin, you pitch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you bat. Rin, you pitch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What about me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What about me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「端っこで素振りでもしてろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Stay on the sideline and take practice swings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Stay on the sideline and take practice swings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんかどーでもいい感じだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Somehow, it doesn't look like I'll be doing much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Somehow, it doesn't look like I'll be doing much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ま、いいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, whatever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, whatever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、じゃ、始めよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's get started!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's get started!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ…これはギャグなのか…？　オレはつっこめばいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What kind of joke is this? What kind of slapstick humor is this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What kind of joke is this? What kind of slapstick humor is this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「違う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「手がすべっただけだ、次は任せろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My hand slipped. It won't happen next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My hand slipped. It won't happen next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「イテテ…真人、ギャグじゃなかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ow... Masato, that wasn't something to laugh about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ow... Masato, that wasn't something to laugh about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm sorry, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm sorry, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ストーップ、タンマだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Stop! Time out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Stop! Time out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなが集まってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone gathered around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone gathered around.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、ずばり言おう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, I'll be frank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, I'll be frank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは$K67ノーコン$K0だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're a $K67no-con$K0.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're a $K67no-con$K0.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「しかも、神懸かり的な、だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In fact, your lack of control is of legendary proportions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In fact, your lack of control is of legendary proportions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「違う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「手がすべっただけだ、次は大丈夫だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My hand slipped. It won't happen again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My hand slipped. It won't happen again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、おまえ汗っかきなのか？　手がぬるぬるなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's wrong, are you sweating? Is your hand slimy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's wrong, are you sweating? Is your hand slimy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほら、握手してみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come on, let's shake hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come on, let's shake hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ぎゃああぁぁーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Gyaaah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Gyaaah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんで思いっきりつねられるんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What did you pinch me so hard for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What did you pinch me so hard for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ぬるぬる言うからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You called my hand slimy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You called my hand slimy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、握手」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, give me your hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, give me your hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その手を握ってみるが、決して汗っぽいわけではなく、すべすべした感触だ。
MESSAGE.EN: When I took her hand, I didn't feel any trace of sweat or anything. In fact it felt quite smooth.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I took her hand, I didn't feel any trace of sweat or anything. In fact it felt quite smooth.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ノーコンじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not a no-con.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not a no-con.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「うーむ…待ってろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hm... wait here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hm... wait here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は背中を向けどこかに歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke turned away from us and took off somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke turned away from us and took off somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 体育倉庫の中に姿を消した。
MESSAGE.EN: He disappeared into the gym warehouse.
MESSAGE.Translation: He disappeared into the gym warehouse.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、ロージンだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, here's some rosin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, here's some rosin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 戻ってくると、白い小袋を鈴に手渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: When he returned, he handed a small bag to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: When he returned, he handed a small bag to Rin.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Raisin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Raisin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「すべり止めだ。それ握ってから投げてみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is to prevent slipping. Put some on and try another pitch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is to prevent slipping. Put some on and try another pitch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それでも、ノーコンだった場合は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If even this doesn't work...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If even this doesn't work...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「場合は…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If it doesn't...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If it doesn't...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえを神なるノーコンと呼ぶ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You shall be called the ❛Legendary no-con.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You shall be called the ❛Legendary no-con.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: さわっと鈴の前髪が風で踊った。
MESSAGE.EN: A breeze made Rin's forelocks dance.
MESSAGE.Translation: A breeze made Rin's forelocks dance.

MESSAGE.JP: その目がきっと険しくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: A sharp look appeared in her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sharp look appeared in her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: …そんな屈辱はまっぴらごめんだ、と。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She looked like she was going to use every means necessary to prevent such humiliation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She looked like she was going to use every means necessary to prevent such humiliation.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「今度こっちに飛んできたら、オレが打ってやるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If the ball comes my way this time, I'm so gonna hit it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If the ball comes my way this time, I'm so gonna hit it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「んなとこ投げるかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝As if I'd throw it there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝As if I'd throw it there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吐きすてて、マウンドへ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood on the mound.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood on the mound.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「最初投げてたじゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Didn't you throw it here the first time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Didn't you throw it here the first time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よーし、再開だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, resume practice!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, resume practice!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほんとに打てた!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He really did hit it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He really did hit it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ひゅぅ…ちなみにオレ自身が一番驚いてるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew... And for the record, I'm even more surprised about it than you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew... And for the record, I'm even more surprised about it than you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「悪いが鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry, Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry, Rin...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは神なるノーコンだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You shall be called the ❛Legendary no-con.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You shall be called the ❛Legendary no-con.❜❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Guh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Guh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、練習するぞっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, let's get back to practice!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, let's get back to practice!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の雄叫びがグラウンドに響き渡る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's war cry resounded across the sports grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's war cry resounded across the sports grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、鈴のやる気に火がついたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, Rin's finally fired up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, Rin's finally fired up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何がいいんだか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's so great about that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's so great about that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺も守備に加わる。理樹、俺はいろんなところを守るから俺めがけて打て」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll be a fielder. Riki, hit the balls toward me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll be a fielder. Riki, hit the balls toward me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「守備範囲なら取って返してやる。いいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝When the balls come into my territory, I'll catch them and throw them back to you. 'Kay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝When the balls come into my territory, I'll catch them and throw them back to you. 'Kay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ボールがストライクにきた時は考えてみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll give it a try if she pitches strikes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll give it a try if she pitches strikes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「案外ストライクくるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Her pitching is unexpectedly good...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Her pitching is unexpectedly good...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、神なるは取ってやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'll remove the ❛Legendary❜ part.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'll remove the ❛Legendary❜ part.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その日、鈴のノーコンの名が返上されることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, her title stayed the same throughout the day.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, her title stayed the same throughout the day.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし。もう、いいだろ、今日は終わりにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, that's enough. Let's call it a day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, that's enough. Let's call it a day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなでトンボをかけて、荒れたグラウンドをならす。
MESSAGE.EN: We raked the field.
MESSAGE.Translation: We raked the field.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なあ、オレがしたいのはこんな回りくどいスポーツなんかじゃなく、拳を直接交える熱いバトルなんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You know, this kind of passive sport isn't something I want to do. I want something where I can use my fists... like a hot battle, or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You know, this kind of passive sport isn't something I want to do. I want something where I can use my fists... like a hot battle, or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえじゃ、謙吾相手じゃないと張り合えないだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Listen now, unless your opponent is someone like Kengo, it can't even be called a match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Listen now, unless your opponent is someone like Kengo, it can't even be called a match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あ、そーだ、そいつもルールに則った遊びにしちまおう。そのほうが楽しいだろ、な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, that's it. I'll create rules and have him follow them as well. It'll be more fun this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, that's it. I'll create rules and have him follow them as well. It'll be more fun this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また新しい遊び？　好きだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A new game? You sure love them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A new game? You sure love them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ランキング制にしよう。理由は無論、燃えるからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's make a ranking system. The reason, obviously, is to heat up the competition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's make a ranking system. The reason, obviously, is to heat up the competition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、ひとつ上の奴としか戦えない。対戦は断れない。勝ったらそいつと順位が入れ替わる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You can only fight with a person one rank above you. Refusing to fight is prohibited. If you win, you switch ranks with that person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You can only fight with a person one rank above you. Refusing to fight is prohibited. If you win, you switch ranks with that person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「負けたら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And if you don't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And if you don't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「負けたら、そうだな…勝った奴から称号が与えられる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you don't, then... let's see... The winner chooses a title for the loser.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you don't, then... let's see... The winner chooses a title for the loser.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「称号？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Title?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Title?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あだ名みたいなもんだ。さっきの鈴みたいな、な。痛くはないが、不名誉だろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Something like a nickname. Just like the one Rin received earlier. It doesn't hurt, but it's a disgrace.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Something like a nickname. Just like the one Rin received earlier. It doesn't hurt, but it's a disgrace.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「武器についてはこれまで通りだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As for weapons, the system is the same as before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As for weapons, the system is the same as before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「対戦が決まったら、俺が野次馬を呼んでやる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Once the battle's been decided, I'll gather some onlookers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Once the battle's been decided, I'll gather some onlookers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「その連中が投げ入れたものから武器を無作為に空中で選び取る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝These onlookers will throw different items at you, and you'll randomly pick one of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝These onlookers will throw different items at you, and you'll randomly pick one of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「女子の場合は、意図的に落ちているものの中から選び取っても構わないとする。これはハンデだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As for girls, they're free to choose whichever item they want from the thrown ones. That's the handicap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As for girls, they're free to choose whichever item they want from the thrown ones. That's the handicap.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まず暫定の順位はそうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, a ranking for the time being...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, a ranking for the time being...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺は最下位でいいや。で、四位が真人、三位が鈴、二位が理樹、一位が謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm fine with last place, Masato is fourth, Rin third, Riki second, Kengo first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm fine with last place, Masato is fourth, Rin third, Riki second, Kengo first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一位の謙吾には、暫定王者の称号が与えられた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo, being number one in the rankings, was given the title of provisional ruler.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo, being number one in the rankings, was given the title of provisional ruler.

MESSAGE.JP: つまりは…
MESSAGE.EN: In other words...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words...

MESSAGE.JP: 不名誉な称号を与えられたら、一位になってその『バトルランキング暫定王者』の称号を手に入れるしかない、というわけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Those who receive a disgraceful title are left with but one option: to acquire the title of ❝Provisional Ruler of the Battle Rankings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Those who receive a disgraceful title are left with but one option: to acquire the title of ❝Provisional Ruler of the Battle Rankings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なら燃えざるをえない。
MESSAGE.EN: Meaning the competition will inevitably heat up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meaning the competition will inevitably heat up.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもながら恭介の考える遊びには隙がない。
MESSAGE.EN: Like always, there's no end to the games Kyousuke comes up with.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like always, there's no end to the games Kyousuke comes up with.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オーケー。じゃ早速だが、鈴よ、対戦を申し込むぜ。四位なんて不名誉まっぴらだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay. Well then, Rin, let's hurry up and start the competition. Fourth place for me is an absolute disgrace.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay. Well then, Rin, let's hurry up and start the competition. Fourth place for me is an absolute disgrace.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇ、恭介の話聞いてなかったのかよっっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You little... Didn't you listen to what Kyousuke just said!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You little... Didn't you listen to what Kyousuke just said!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「順位がひとつ下の奴から対戦を申し込まれたら、断れねぇんだよっ、黙って頷け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If someone one place below you challenges you, you can't refuse. Just be a good kid and follow the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If someone one place below you challenges you, you can't refuse. Just be a good kid and follow the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こくり、と本当に黙って頷いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded and fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded and fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オーケー、そうこなくっちゃな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, that's the spirit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, that's the spirit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が携帯を手に何か話している。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was saying something into his cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was saying something into his cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: ぽつぽつと人が集まり始める。
MESSAGE.EN: One by one, people started gathering around.
MESSAGE.Translation: One by one, people started gathering around.

MESSAGE.JP: 校内だけでなく、すでに下校している生徒も混ざっているのだろう、私服の人間もいる。
MESSAGE.EN: And not just people who were currently on school grounds; some that had gone home already, as well as some in casual clothes, were among them.
MESSAGE.Translation: And not just people who were currently on school grounds; some that had gone home already, as well as some in casual clothes, were among them.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よし、てめぇら、武器よこせ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, you there, give me a weapon!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, you there, give me a weapon!❞

MESSAGE.JP: また盛大に色々なものが投げ込まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again a great number of different items were being thrown.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again a great number of different items were being thrown.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、おまえら、戦いたいのか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's up with you guys? You want to fight too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's up with you guys? You want to fight too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「にゃー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Meow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Meow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の武器は猫に決まったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin settled on her cats as her weapon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin settled on her cats as her weapon.

MESSAGE.JP: 一方真人は…
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, on the other hand...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, on the other hand...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「またこんなしょぼいのかよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Some sorry looking thing again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Some sorry looking thing again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 爪切り！
MESSAGE.EN: Nail clippers!
MESSAGE.Translation: Nail clippers!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まあいい、相手は猫だ、ダメージは少なかろう。鈴、ゆっくり深爪にしてジュースのプルタブ開けられないようにしてやるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh well, my opponent's just a cat. It can't hurt me much. Rin, I'll slowly trim your nails so that you won't even be able to pull the tab off a juice can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh well, my opponent's just a cat. It can't hurt me much. Rin, I'll slowly trim your nails so that you won't even be able to pull the tab off a juice can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の背後にはわらわらと猫が集まり始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Cats started swarming around Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cats started swarming around Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「って、一匹じゃねぇの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What? It's not just one!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What? It's not just one!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「バトルスタート！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Battle Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Battle Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子生徒@「勝者、鈴！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝The winner is Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝The winner is Rin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: うおおーっ！　歓声がどっと湧く。
MESSAGE.EN: The audience roared excitedly and loudly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The audience roared excitedly and loudly.

MESSAGE.JP: `男子生徒@「では鈴様、あの負け犬めに称号をどうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Now, Rin-sama, pick a title for that loser.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Now, Rin-sama, pick a title for that loser.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「クズ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Waste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Waste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおおぉーっ、そんな称号いやだあぁぁーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaa, I don't want this title!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaa, I don't want this title!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、可哀相に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, poor thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, poor thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すでに他の４人は席について食べ始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The four of them were already in the cafeteria eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: The four of them were already in the cafeteria eating.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「遅くなっちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry I'm late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry I'm late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もお盆を手に席につく。
MESSAGE.EN: I also sat down with my tray.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also sat down with my tray.

MESSAGE.JP: 今晩のメニューは二種類のコロッケ定食だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Tonight's menu is a set of two different kinds of croquette.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tonight's menu is a set of two different kinds of croquette.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「悪い、クズ、ソース取ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, Waste, could you pass me the sauce?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, Waste, could you pass me the sauce?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほらよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まさ…あ、いや、クズはマヨネーズいらないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Masa... ah no, Waste, do you need any mayonnaise?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Masa... ah no, Waste, do you need any mayonnaise?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もらうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ、そんなにかけるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, you used so much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, you used so much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わりぃかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Got a problem?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Got a problem?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「次あたし使うから早くしろ、クズ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm next, hurry up, Waste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm next, hurry up, Waste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うああぁぁああーーっ！　こんなん耐えられるかあぁぁーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaaa, I can't take it anymore!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaaa, I can't take it anymore!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「イジメかあぁーー！　てめぇら筋肉イジメて楽しいかああぁーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you bullying me? Is it that much fun bullying the Muscle!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you bullying me? Is it that much fun bullying the Muscle!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、ルールだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, such are the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, such are the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、今すぐ勝負だ、そこのノーコンーーーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, I want a battle right now. You there, no-con!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, I want a battle right now. You there, no-con!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うっさいクズ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, Waste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, Waste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あとひとつ、ルールを言い忘れてた。連続で同じカードの勝負は認めない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I forgot to tell you about one other rule. It's not allowed for the same pair to fight twice in a row.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I forgot to tell you about one other rule. It's not allowed for the same pair to fight twice in a row.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「同じカードばかりだと見てるほうも飽きるだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Because the spectators would get bored.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Because the spectators would get bored.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ、鈴、理樹に挑めっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, Rin, you challenge Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, Rin, you challenge Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いやじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ、理樹、謙吾に挑めっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, Riki, you challenge Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, Riki, you challenge Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、勝てるわけないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No. I can't win...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No. I can't win...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ、順位も称号もこのまんまじゃねぇかよーーーっっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, my rank, my title, nothing's gonna change!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, my rank, my title, nothing's gonna change!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だまれボケ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, blockhead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, blockhead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああん？　おまえ、今、ボケって言ったよな？　ボケってなんだよっ、そんな呼び方許可してねぇよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What? You said blockhead just now, didn't you? What's with that? Whoever approved of calling me blockhead!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What? You said blockhead just now, didn't you? What's with that? Whoever approved of calling me blockhead!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃ、だまれクズ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, shut up, Waste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, shut up, Waste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うあああぁぁーっ！　そっちのほうが傷つくことに今気づいたぁぁーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaaa! I just realized that this title hurts my feelings even more!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaaa! I just realized that this title hurts my feelings even more!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相も変わらず賑やかな夕食となった。
MESSAGE.EN: Today's dinner was noisy as per usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today's dinner was noisy as per usual.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さて、腹もこなれたし、そろそろ謙吾と戦うか、なっ、理樹っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well then, the food should've settled in by now. Isn't it about time you fought Kengo, eh, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well then, the food should've settled in by now. Isn't it about time you fought Kengo, eh, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな自然を装われても、つられないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you say it so casually, I'm not getting tricked...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you say it so casually, I'm not getting tricked...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「けしかけるなら、一番情に弱いおまえしかいねぇんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I know I can count on you, since you have the kindest heart of us all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I know I can count on you, since you have the kindest heart of us all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなぶっちゃけられても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you appeal to me this frankly, nothing changes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you appeal to me this frankly, nothing changes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「頼む！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm begging you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm begging you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう仕方がないなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh well, looks like I have no other choice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh well, looks like I have no other choice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よしっ、やっぱり理樹は情に弱いなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yes! I knew I could count on your kind-heartedness!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yes! I knew I could count on your kind-heartedness!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな堂々としめしめうまくいった的なこと言われるとすごくやる気なくなるんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That just sounds like I've been jobbed by you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That just sounds like I've been jobbed by you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恭介にメールを投げておく。
MESSAGE.EN: I sent Kyousuke an email;
MESSAGE.Translation: I sent Kyousuke an email;

MESSAGE.JP: これから謙吾と戦う、と。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll challenge Kengo right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll challenge Kengo right now.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、疲れてるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but I'm really tired.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but I'm really tired.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「疲れてるのかっ、くそーっ、なんて不運だ！　早く元気になってくれよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you? Damn! Crap, what rotten luck! Get better soon, please!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you? Damn! Crap, what rotten luck! Get better soon, please!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、うん…（すごい！　適当ないいわけを信じてる！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O, okay... (Amazing! He actually bought my lame excuse!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O, okay... (Amazing! He actually bought my lame excuse!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今度ばかりはごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but not this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but not this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、オレがおまえのフリして行ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, I guess I'll just pretend to be you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, I guess I'll just pretend to be you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「無理ありすぎだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no way that'll work...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no way that'll work...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『こちら鈴。女子寮に潜入成功、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[This is Rin. I've successfully infiltrated the girls' dorm. Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[This is Rin. I've successfully infiltrated the girls' dorm. Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: 改造した携帯から鈴の声。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's voice was coming from the modified cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's voice was coming from the modified cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 今夜も夕べに引き続き、鈴の勧誘作戦が始まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's member-hunting mission has begun for tonight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's member-hunting mission has begun for tonight.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうでもいいが、普通に入っただけだろ。それは潜入とは言わない、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Not that it really matters, but didn't you just go in normally like you always do? That isn't called infiltration, over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Not that it really matters, but didn't you just go in normally like you always do? That isn't called infiltration, over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うっさい、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Shut up, over!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Shut up, over!]

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「馬鹿なやり取りで時間を無駄にするな、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Cut the idiotic chatter, you're wasting time, over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Cut the idiotic chatter, you're wasting time, over.❞
