MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『馬鹿はおまえじゃ、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[You're the idiot, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[You're the idiot, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちなみに、同時に送受信できるから、オーバー言う必要ないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝By the way, there's no need to add ❛over❜ any longer, since we're using transceivers now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝By the way, there's no need to add ❛over❜ any longer, since we're using transceivers now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はまったく乗り気ではないはずなのに、寝る直前のこの時間だけは僕たちに付き合ってくれている。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though Kengo supposedly had no interest in the whole thing, he was still hanging out with us right before bedtime.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though Kengo supposedly had no interest in the whole thing, he was still hanging out with us right before bedtime.

MESSAGE.JP: 部活の練習で疲れて、早く休みたいだろうに、それも厭わず。
MESSAGE.EN: He was surely worn out after practice and wanted to hurry up and get to sleep, yet he didn't seem to mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was surely worn out after practice and wanted to hurry up and get to sleep, yet he didn't seem to mind.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、ターゲットを探せ。廊下に誰かいないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, look for a target. Is there anybody in the corridor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, look for a target. Is there anybody in the corridor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『いる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[There is.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[There is.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「知ってるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Someone you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Someone you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『知らない。たぶん三年』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No, probably a third-year.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No, probably a third-year.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「三年の勧誘は無理だろ…こんな大事な時期に野球なんてする奴がいたらそいつアホだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If it's a third-year, there's no hope of talking them into playing baseball... What kind of fool would do that at such a critical time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If it's a third-year, there's no hope of talking them into playing baseball... What kind of fool would do that at such a critical time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「待て…この俺が…アホだとぉ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wait... You mean... I'm a fool?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wait... You mean... I'm a fool?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh crap...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh crap...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「はっ、アホさっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hah, then I am one!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hah, then I am one!❞

MESSAGE.JP: さわやかに受け止めてみせた！
MESSAGE.EN: He replied in a refreshing tone!
MESSAGE.Translation: He replied in a refreshing tone!

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、俺はアホだからこうしてここにいるが、確かに普通はありえない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'm a fool, that's why I'm here. It's certainly not something people would normally be doing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'm a fool, that's why I'm here. It's certainly not something people would normally be doing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「けど、すでに内定が出ていて暇な奴がいるかもしれないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's not set in stone - there just might be some people with free time on their hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's not set in stone - there just might be some people with free time on their hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「普通に進学校だぞ？　この時期に就職が決まってのんきにしてる奴がいたら、この学校におまえは何をしにきたんだ？と問いたいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is a prep school. I'd like to ask those who already got themselves a job but are still fooling around what they're doing here at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is a prep school. I'd like to ask those who already got themselves a job but are still fooling around what they're doing here at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…何をしにきたかだとぉ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What they're doing here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What they're doing here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「しまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I did it again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I did it again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「青春さ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝To enjoy our youth!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝To enjoy our youth!❞

MESSAGE.JP: さわやかに受け止めてみせた！
MESSAGE.EN: He replied in a refreshing tone!
MESSAGE.Translation: He replied in a refreshing tone!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『いや、おまえ内定出てないし、のんきにしてていい奴じゃないだろ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Well, you haven't found yourself a job yet. It's no time for you to be resting on your laurels.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Well, you haven't found yourself a job yet. It's no time for you to be resting on your laurels.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「む、予想外なところからツッコミが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, a riposte from an unexpected place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, a riposte from an unexpected place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いや、おまえ内定出てないし、のんきにしてていい奴じゃないだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, you haven't found yourself a job yet. It's no time for you to be resting on your laurels.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, you haven't found yourself a job yet. It's no time for you to be resting on your laurels.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『とっとと指示しろ、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Hurry up and give me further instructions, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Hurry up and give me further instructions, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とりあえず挨拶だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝For starters, a greeting will do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝For starters, a greeting will do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「またヘンなの考えるんじゃないだろうねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you getting weird ideas again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you getting weird ideas again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ここは、『見ない顔だねぇ』でどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How about ❛I haven't seen you around❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How about ❛I haven't seen you around❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、ぜったいダメだからねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, this one is an absolute no-no.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, this one is an absolute no-no.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が僕の言うことを聞いてくれてほっとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm relieved that she listened to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm relieved that she listened to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、こんばんは、と挨拶しよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, try to greet her with ❛Good evening.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, try to greet her with ❛Good evening.❜❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Good...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Good...]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…通り過ぎてった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...She passed by.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...She passed by.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ…つれない人だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, what an unfriendly person...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, what an unfriendly person...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『あなた、今、このわたくしに向かって、何か言おうとしたわね？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Just now, what did you say to me?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Just now, what did you say to me?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とは別の、聞き覚えのある声。この声の主は…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was another familiar voice, belonging to none other than...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was another familiar voice, belonging to none other than...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『笹瀬川佐々美っ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちっ、またあいつかよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tsk, her again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tsk, her again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この人、計ったようなタイミングで現れるよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What impeccable timing, as if she were doing it on purpose...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What impeccable timing, as if she were doing it on purpose...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は冷静になり、姿勢を正す。
MESSAGE.EN: I calmed down and sat upright.
MESSAGE.Translation: I calmed down and sat upright.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『違う、おまえになんか言ってない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No, I wasn't talking to you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No, I wasn't talking to you.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『じゃあ、さっきの三年生？　あの人はソフト部だから、わざとあなたを無視したのよ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Then, was it that third year that just passed by? She's from the softball club, so wasn't she deliberately ignoring you?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Then, was it that third year that just passed by? She's from the softball club, so wasn't she deliberately ignoring you?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『どーしてだ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Why would she?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Why would she?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『あなたたち、放課後グラウンド、許可なく使用していたでしょ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Aren't you people using the sports grounds after school without permission?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Aren't you people using the sports grounds after school without permission?]

MESSAGE.JP: ちりん、と鈴が鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's bell chimed as she nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's bell chimed as she nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『だからよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[That's why.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[That's why.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『あの弱小野球部がいなくなってせいせいしたと思っていたのに、どうしてあなたたちが？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Ever since that miniscule baseball club ceased to exist, I could finally feel relieved. Why did you have to appear now?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Ever since that miniscule baseball club ceased to exist, I could finally feel relieved. Why did you have to appear now?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…青春だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...❛To enjoy our youth.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...❛To enjoy our youth.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『そんなつまらないことを…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Such a boring reason...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Such a boring reason...]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『つまらんことはない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It's not boring.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It's not boring.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『わたくしにはどうでもよくってよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[I couldn't care less about that.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[I couldn't care less about that.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…ダメなのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...Can't I?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...Can't I?]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、ちょっと食いついてるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, she's not unwilling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, she's not unwilling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああー！　ぜったいダメっ！　一年長く寮にいる先輩に対して『見ない顔だねぇ』って、一番ありえない挨拶だからっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No! She can't do that! To say something like that to her senior, who's already lived in the dorm for at least a year, is unthinkable!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No! She can't do that! To say something like that to her senior, who's already lived in the dorm for at least a year, is unthinkable!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「えぇー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eeh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eeh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだよ、その、こいつ空気読んでね～みたいな目はっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's with that ❛learn to read the mood❜ look on your face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's with that ❛learn to read the mood❜ look on your face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、寮での鈴の立場が悪くなったらどうすんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What're you going to do if that damages her reputation in the dorm!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What're you going to do if that damages her reputation in the dorm!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…どうする、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you want to do, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you want to do, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が訊いた。わざわざ訊くようなことでもないと思ったが…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke asked her. I thought there was no need to do that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke asked her. I thought there was no need to do that...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…言ってみる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...I'll give it a try.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...I'll give it a try.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、鈴のばかーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No! Rin, you idiot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No! Rin, you idiot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、女みたいだぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You sound like a girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You sound like a girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ま、何事も挑戦か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, trying out every approach is important...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, trying out every approach is important...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「挑戦するようなことじゃないーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not something worth trying!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not something worth trying!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、女みたいだぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You sound like a girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You sound like a girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきも聞いたよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I heard you the first time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I heard you the first time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ところで…その三年はまだいるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝By the way, is that third-year girl still there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝By the way, is that third-year girl still there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『いない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No.]

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は前のめり、そのままお手製ちゃぶ台に突っ伏す。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a nosedive and rammed my face into the hand-made table.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a nosedive and rammed my face into the hand-made table.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「今日のおまえは真人よりおもしろいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're even funnier than Masato today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're even funnier than Masato today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　オレ普段そんなにおもしろいかな、いきなり言われると照れるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? You think I'm usually that funny? Saying that so suddenly, you're making me blush...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? You think I'm usually that funny? Saying that so suddenly, you're making me blush...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『こいつ馬鹿だ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What an idiot!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What an idiot!]

MESSAGE.JP: もう、無茶苦茶だ…。なんもかもどうでもよくなってくる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh no, everything got messed up. Well, okay, whatever...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh no, everything got messed up. Well, okay, whatever...

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『あなた、今、このわたくしに向かって、馬鹿と言ったわね？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[You, did you just now call me an idiot?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[You, did you just now call me an idiot?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とは別の、聞き覚えのある声。この声の主は…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was another familiar voice, belonging to none other than...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was another familiar voice, belonging to none other than...

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tsk, her again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tsk, her again!?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What impeccable timing, as if she were doing it on purpose...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What impeccable timing, as if she were doing it on purpose...❞

MESSAGE.EN: I calmed down and sat upright.
MESSAGE.Translation: I calmed down and sat upright.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No, I wasn't talking to you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No, I wasn't talking to you.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『そうかしら？　他に人なんていなくてよ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Really? There's no one else around, though.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Really? There's no one else around, though.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『それはさておき…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Putting that aside...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Putting that aside...]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『あなたたち、放課後グラウンド、許可なく使用していたでしょ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Aren't you people using the sports grounds after school without permission?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Aren't you people using the sports grounds after school without permission?]

MESSAGE.JP: ちりん、と鈴が鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's bell chimed as she nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's bell chimed as she nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『あの弱小野球部がいなくなってせいせいしたと思っていたのに、どうしてあなたたちが？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Ever since that miniscule baseball club ceased to exist, I could finally feel relieved. Why did you have to appear now?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Ever since that miniscule baseball club ceased to exist, I could finally feel relieved. Why did you have to appear now?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『青春だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[❛To enjoy our youth.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[❛To enjoy our youth.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『そんなつまらないことを…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Such a boring reason...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Such a boring reason...]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『同じグラウンドで我が女子ソフトボール部が練習中だったのが見えなくて？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Didn't you notice that our girls' softball club was in the middle of practice?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Didn't you notice that our girls' softball club was in the middle of practice?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『端っこでキャッチボールするぐらいなら見逃してあげるけど、これ以上規模を大きくするようなら、黙っていないわよ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[If you were playing catchball somewhere on the edge of the field, we could let you be. Anything more than that, and we won't keep silent about it.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[If you were playing catchball somewhere on the edge of the field, we could let you be. Anything more than that, and we won't keep silent about it.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…どうするつもりだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...What are you planning to do?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...What are you planning to do?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『まったくわかってないのねぇ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You really don't understand, do you...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You really don't understand, do you...]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『なら今ここでわからせてあげる…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Then I'll make you understand, right here, right now...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Then I'll make you understand, right here, right now...]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『おまえたち、やっておしまいなさい！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]

MESSAGE.JP: びしっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Punch*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Punch*!

MESSAGE.JP: ばしっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Kick*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Kick*!

MESSAGE.JP: ばきっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: どぐっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam*!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ、聞こえてくる音がなんか戦ってるぽいよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwa, sounds like they're having a fight!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwa, sounds like they're having a fight!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当然だ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Obviously!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Obviously!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度は本気で参りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんな尻の青い下級生にすら勝てないなんて、話にもならないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ミッションコンプリート』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、してないしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、戦利品だ。やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「本気になれば、よっゆーーっですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's just a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's just a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ざっとこんなものですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「さすがは、佐々美様っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝As expected from Sasami-sama!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝As expected from Sasami-sama!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「華麗でございましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Your fighting style is really elegant!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Your fighting style is really elegant!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: うわぁ…予習しようと思ってたのにこんな時間に…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh wow, it's this late already? I had meant to study for tomorrow's classes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh wow, it's this late already? I had meant to study for tomorrow's classes...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介たちと遊ぶ時間も僕にとっては大事だから、そのぶんは、今から取り戻そう。
MESSAGE.EN: Studying is as important to me as playing with the guys, so I'll do it now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Studying is as important to me as playing with the guys, so I'll do it now.

MESSAGE.JP: 引き出しから教科書を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to take my textbook out of the drawer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to take my textbook out of the drawer.

MESSAGE.JP: あと、ノートと…。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh, my notebook...
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh, my notebook...

MESSAGE.JP: …ありゃ？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Where is it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Where is it?

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、と思い出す。前回の授業の後、寝ていた真人に貸したんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered lending it to Masato after the previous lesson because he had been sleeping the entire time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered lending it to Masato after the previous lesson because he had been sleeping the entire time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、ノートは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, where's my notebook?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, where's my notebook?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだい、それは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What notebook?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What notebook?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「古文のノート。貸したでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The one for classical Japanese. I lent it to you, didn't I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The one for classical Japanese. I lent it to you, didn't I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、あれか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah, that one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah, that one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「悪いがちょっとの時間、俺の机で寝かしてある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm sorry, but I'm curing it in my desk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm sorry, but I'm curing it in my desk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなぬか床の漬け物みたいに言わないでよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't treat my notebook like pickles!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't treat my notebook like pickles!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、出してよ、予習するんだからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just give it back. I'll need it to study now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just give it back. I'll need it to study now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、教室の机で寝かしてるのさ。不幸なことにな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, it's being cured in my classroom desk. A crying shame.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, it's being cured in my classroom desk. A crying shame.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは僕のセリフだよっ！　あーもうっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's my line! For god's sake!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's my line! For god's sake!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おっと、本気で怒らしちまったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Shoot, it looks like I really pissed you off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Shoot, it looks like I really pissed you off...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わかったわかった、今から取りにいこうと思えるように努力してみるからよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright, alright, I'll just try to make myself feel like fetching the notebook!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, alright, I'll just try to make myself feel like fetching the notebook!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その時間が惜しいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's just a waste of time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's just a waste of time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 怒りが頂点を飛び越えて、逆に脱力する。
MESSAGE.EN: My anger had reached a critical mass, and I became tired of talking to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: My anger had reached a critical mass, and I became tired of talking to him.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、どうしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now what do I do...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now what do I do...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん？　どこいくんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hm? Where are you going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hm? Where are you going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「取りにいってくるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll go get the notebook.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll go get the notebook.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、オレも一緒にいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll go too, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll go too, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なら、最初からひとりで行ってよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why didn't you go on your own!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why didn't you go on your own!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　オレなんかへんなこと言ったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Did I just say something weird?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Did I just say something weird?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まるで僕と一緒ならなんでもいいみたいだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: He sounded like he was OK with doing anything as long as I was with him...
MESSAGE.Translation: He sounded like he was OK with doing anything as long as I was with him...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は怒ってるんだから、突き放してやろう。ちょっとは落ち込めってもんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But since I was seriously angry, I decided to turn him away, wanting him to feel even a little bad about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But since I was seriously angry, I decided to turn him away, wanting him to feel even a little bad about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひとりでいく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll go by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll go by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うあ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛ぁあぁぁあぁぁぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaahhhhhhhhh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaahhhhhhhhh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな予想以上に落ち込まないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No need to be so depressed about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No need to be so depressed about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人を部屋にひとり残し、校舎に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I left him in our room and headed for the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left him in our room and headed for the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 簡単に鍵のかかっていないドアを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I easily managed to find a door that had been left unlocked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I easily managed to find a door that had been left unlocked.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいのかな、この学校、こんな無防備で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This school needs to work on its security...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This school needs to work on its security...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑い声が聞こえた気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I heard someone laughing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I heard someone laughing.

MESSAGE.JP: 聞き間違いだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Or was I just hearing things?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or was I just hearing things?

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かいるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was someone there?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was someone there?

MESSAGE.JP: 居た。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes.

MESSAGE.JP: そう思った直後には、僕は床に頬をなすりつけていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The next thing I knew, my cheek was pressed onto the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The next thing I knew, my cheek was pressed onto the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 背中を押さえられ、片腕が捻られている。
MESSAGE.EN: The person I'd just seen was now riding on my back, gripping my arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: The person I'd just seen was now riding on my back, gripping my arm.

MESSAGE.JP: 身じろぎひとつすれば、脱臼させられそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I moved even the slightest bit, they would probably dislocate my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I moved even the slightest bit, they would probably dislocate my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: だから僕は無抵抗のままでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: So that would not happen, I did not resist.
MESSAGE.Translation: So that would not happen, I did not resist.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「この学園の生徒だな…なぜこんな時間にいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝You are a student from this school... Why are you here at this hour?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝You are a student from this school... Why are you here at this hour?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子の声だったのが意外だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was surprised to hear a girl's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was surprised to hear a girl's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「教室に忘れたノートを取りにきたんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was on my way to my classroom to get my notebook...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was on my way to my classroom to get my notebook...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その答えを訝しんでいるような静寂。
MESSAGE.EN: She fell silent, as though doubting me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fell silent, as though doubting me.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「振り返らずに、廊下を走りきり正面の非常ドアから外に出られるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Do you think you'll be able to run straight down the hallway and get outside from the emergency exit door in front without turning around?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Do you think you'll be able to run straight down the hallway and get outside from the emergency exit door in front without turning around?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「非常ドアを開けるのには手間取るかもしれませんが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, but I think getting the door open would be a bit hard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, but I think getting the door open would be a bit hard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「普通に開く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝It'll open easily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝It'll open easily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for the info...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for the info...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「手を離したら、スタートだ。いいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Once I let go of your arms, start running. Got that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Once I let go of your arms, start running. Got that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手が離れた。スタート。
MESSAGE.EN: She got off of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got off of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がると、僕は言われた通りに駆けた。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as I stood up, I made a run for the emergency door like she had told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as I stood up, I made a run for the emergency door like she had told me.

MESSAGE.JP: 非常口まで辿りつくとノブを捻って表へ。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened it and ran outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened it and ran outside.

MESSAGE.JP: 背後でドアが閉まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The door closed behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door closed behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: ふぅ…と一息をつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Phew... I took a deep breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: Phew... I took a deep breath.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだったんだろう…。若い声だったし、多分この学校の生徒だと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Who was that girl...? She sounded young, so I guess she must be a student of this school...
MESSAGE.Translation: Who was that girl...? She sounded young, so I guess she must be a student of this school...

MESSAGE.JP: ぱん！と乾いた音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang*! I heard a popping sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang*! I heard a popping sound.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんだ!?
MESSAGE.EN: ...What was that?!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What was that?!

MESSAGE.JP: なんとなくだけど…あれは銃声だったんじゃないかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't be entirely certain... but I think that was a gunshot...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't be entirely certain... but I think that was a gunshot...

MESSAGE.JP: ひどく乾いた音だったけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a very dry sound...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a very dry sound...

MESSAGE.JP: 簡単に僕を取り押さえた彼女なら、銃も扱える気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl had had no trouble holding me down, so it was possible she'd be able to handle a gun too.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl had had no trouble holding me down, so it was possible she'd be able to handle a gun too.

MESSAGE.JP: なら、とんでもない事態だということになる…。
MESSAGE.EN: And if that was the case, something terrible might be happening inside right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: And if that was the case, something terrible might be happening inside right now...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕なんかが首を突っ込むより、教師か警察に…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd better leave this to teachers or the police...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd better leave this to teachers or the police...

MESSAGE.JP: と思いながらも、ゆっくりとドアを開けつつある。
MESSAGE.EN: Even as I thought that, I found myself opening the door slowly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even as I thought that, I found myself opening the door slowly.

MESSAGE.JP: そっと覗き込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I quietly took a peep inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quietly took a peep inside.

MESSAGE.JP: …無人？
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was no one there?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was no one there?

MESSAGE.JP: 音がしないようにドアを閉め、もう一度取り押さえられた場所まで進む。今度は慎重に。
MESSAGE.EN: Closing the door without making a sound, I walked up to where she had held me down, treading very carefully this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Closing the door without making a sound, I walked up to where she had held me down, treading very carefully this time.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに何かが落ちていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found something down there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found something down there.

MESSAGE.JP: 拾い上げる。それは生徒手帳だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I picked it up; it was a student handbook.
MESSAGE.Translation: I picked it up; it was a student handbook.

MESSAGE.JP: 持ち主の名は…朱鷺戸沙耶（ときどさや）。
MESSAGE.EN: The name of the owner was... Saya Tokido.
MESSAGE.Translation: The name of the owner was... Saya Tokido.

MESSAGE.JP: 不思議な印象を抱いた。
MESSAGE.EN: It left me with a funny impression.
MESSAGE.Translation: It left me with a funny impression.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなに珍しい苗字なのに、なぜか、その人となりが想像できてしまうような…。
MESSAGE.EN: Though her surname was very rare, I felt like I was able to imagine her character out of it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Though her surname was very rare, I felt like I was able to imagine her character out of it...

MESSAGE.JP: 珍しい苗字だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's a really rare family name...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's a really rare family name...

MESSAGE.JP: クラスは違うけど、同じ学年だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Different class, but same grade.
MESSAGE.Translation: Different class, but same grade.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず僕が持っておいて、明日返してあげよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided I should keep it and give it back to her tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided I should keep it and give it back to her tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下はしんとしたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The hallway remained silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: The hallway remained silent.

MESSAGE.JP: さてと…目的のノートを取りにいこう。
MESSAGE.EN: All right... I'm going to the classroom for the notebook.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right... I'm going to the classroom for the notebook.

MESSAGE.JP: 今の雰囲気は尋常ではなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like there was an extraordinary atmosphere in there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like there was an extraordinary atmosphere in there.

MESSAGE.JP: 厄介ごとに巻き込まれないうちに、大人しく帰ろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd better get back before I get into trouble...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd better get back before I get into trouble...

MESSAGE.JP: 当然と言えば当然なのだけど…ドアにはすべて鍵がかけられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: This might only be as it should be... but all the doors were locked.
MESSAGE.Translation: This might only be as it should be... but all the doors were locked.

MESSAGE.JP: 窓も確かめようとしたけど、そんなところから忍びこむなんて、まるで泥棒だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about checking the windows, but I realized it would just make me look like a burglar.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about checking the windows, but I realized it would just make me look like a burglar.

MESSAGE.JP: 大人しく部屋に戻ろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I should go back to our room...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I should go back to our room...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は寮に帰った。
MESSAGE.EN: I got back to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got back to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 別のノートを使って、明日改めて、写し直そう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I'll use another notebook today and copy the other one tomorrow...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I'll use another notebook today and copy the other one tomorrow...

MESSAGE.JP: そうして今夜も更けていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...
